Name: n-body
About the game: n-body is a short, relaxing golf game in space. Launch stars and master gravity in 4 different solar systems - enjoy the calming soundscapes and slowly form 12 different constellations by progressing through the levels. Sit back and enjoy a short experience (around 30 minutes of gameplay), perfect for people looking for a chill game. Features 12 different constellations to create 4 different seasons with unique soundscapes ~30 minutes of gameplay Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
